duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide a wide range of Thoracic Surgery services in Northwestern Medicine’s Central and Northwest regions.
Participate in academic programs of the Feinberg School of Medicine.
Educational programs including didactic teaching, resident training, preceptorship, and mentoring.
Contribute to research programs and medical advancements in pulmonary and thoracic health.

education_certification.credential: Completion of an ACGME-accredited Thoracic Surgery fellowship/residency program, and board eligibility or certification in Thoracic Surgery.
